segments.text: What's the weather like in your country ? I suppose it must be warmer than here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . We have rather mild winters . It always has much sunshine in winter . But it was very foggy when I left two days ago . I knew it would be colder here , but I thought there would be a lot of snow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We don't have much snow in winter in Beijing . In fact , we haven't had any so far this winter . The winter is rather long , but the cold is generally not severe . The temperature seldom gets as low as ten below zero Centigrade .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the temperature today , do you know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About freezing point , I think.But the morning's forecast said that we are going to have a very cold spell in the next few days - and the temperature will probably drop to 10 or 15 degrees below zero .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm very lucky that my wife let me take a heavy overcoat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is considerate of your wife .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , she is . By the way , what is the best season in Beijing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fall is the best season in Beijing . It's neither hot nor cold . The sky is clear and blue . There's hardly any wind , only a slight breeze which is hardly noticeable . And we have plenty of sunshine too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Then I will come to Beijing in the fall next time .
segments.speaker: S2
